title: Socialise
description: Meet up with friends and family regularly since being around them can make you happy, and they can provide support if you need it

title: Reading
description: Reading some fiction or non-fiction books that you find inspiring or uplifting helps improve your mood, while also letting you de-stress

title: Journaling
description: Keep a journal and write down what you feel or think, which helps you process your feelings, improving your mental health

title: Listen to some music
description: Listening to some calm music can help you feel better if you feel down, since it releases dopamine which makes you feel good!

title: Play sports
description: Playing a sport is a great way to both have fun, clear your mind, relieve yourself of stress, and improve your mental and physical wellbeing

title: Meditate
description: Meditation lets you calm down and think about the smaller things in life, allowing you to clear a cloudy mind and relieving anxiety

title: Yoga
description: Yoga is a great way for you to de-stress and increase bloodflow to different parts your body, making you feel better
